title: Kids live up to elegant space at Piccolo Italian restaurant in Mayfield Heights: Family-friendly restaurant review
text:
Published By: Cleveland.com: Dinig & Drink - Today 
Piccolo Italian restaurant in Mayfield Heights is an elegant space without an official kids menu. But the food was fantastic, and the kids l...
